adHeader: Home Health Aide Caregiver for the Elderly
adDetails: I am an experienced caregiver providing Home Health Aide (HHA) to elderly individuals. I can assist with any health related needs and day-to-day tasks as well as offer friendly companionship. I am available to assist during the daytime hours (8AM-6PM) in the Santa Clara, Sunnyvale, or Cupertino area. Salary and hours are negotiable. Please feel free to contact me at show contact info, voice-mails accepted. Reference available upon request. Thank you for looking and God Bless...
